title: Stuck at Honor Level 2
body: I get honored at least once a game, and I haven't gotten a chat restriction this year, so I am confused on why I am stuck at honor level 2. It seems like people are getting to honor level 4 and 5 way too easily and they appear toxic in my games (or are having a bad game). I'm not sure, but please help.

replies.body: Most people's honor is going to progress at different rates simply due to them playing a different amount of games and getting a different amount of honors each game. To the best of my knowledge, the Honor system is only meant to reflect on yourself and not meant to compare yourself to others.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=tgTfrKV6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-28T01:10:52.217+0000)
>
> Most people's honor is going to progress at different rates simply due to them playing a different amount of games and getting a different amount of honors each game. To the best of my knowledge, the Honor system is only meant to reflect on yourself and not meant to compare yourself to others.

Yes, but I play about an hour or 2 a day and I still don't gain honor. I played 2 games on my friends account and got honor 3 quickly though.
